answers.answer: Lmao cut your head off . thats describes how i feel tho. Im 16 weeks n ive been having headaches since 13.5 everyday sometimes twice a day. It is a pregnancy symptom n goes away eventually i heard.

It could be nothing but a bad headache that lasts a long time could be high blood pressure. Pre eclampsia is high blood pressure during pregnancy, that you didn't have before. At least go to get you BP checked. Lots of pharmacies have those free machines.
Yes, girl!. I know exactly what you mean!. I've had headaches sense Monday on and off. I'm 13+2, and I'm hoping they stop soon for the both of us!.
Headaches can be a sign of preeclampsia. As long as your blood pressure is good and they don't find any protein in you're urine, then you're good.

I'm 16+4 I checked my blood pressure yesterday it was 126/71 I really don't kno what that means but I have a doc appt tmrw and I will defiantly tell her. Just wanted to kno if anyone else gets them this bad. This is the first time in my whole pregnancy that ive gotten a headache and it's just extreme, i sleep with an icepack on my head.
Well your blood pressure is fine it seems. But yeah, tell your doctor about your headache. Have you tried taking Tylenol? Hope you feel better!(:
Yes!! I'm 35 weeks & I've had the worst headache ever for 3 days. I also had a fever too. & Tylenol barely works for me.

Im 28 weeks and since ifound out ive been preg ive had headaches BAD. I would have to sleep with an icepack on my head as well,  and tylenol doesnt work for me and it lastest days and all day i tell my doc all they say is take tylenol it *****. Cause if i wake up with a headache tht ruins my whole day all iwanna do is either sleep or js lay down.
Yeah I took Tylenol it doesn't do anything. I've had trouble breathing from my sinus since the beginning but it's never given me a headache before. Thank you! Good to kno im not the only one

question: Anyone else have A headache for days? My heads been throbbing on and off since Sunday I'm ready to cut my head off! Is this even normal??
title: never ending headache
